'''1.21.124''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on November 21, 2025, which fixes some bugs reported in previous releases.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/41224903492621-Minecraft-1-21-124-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.124 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=November 21, 2025}}</ref> While this wasn't the last update to 1.21, it was the last one before the beta/Preview builds of [[26.0]] started.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.124
|230711|Unable to connect to Realms or Multiplayer worlds - Error code Boat
|230785|CJK Input Methods aren't blocked at Game Launch triggering wrong input and allowing to block Player movement
|230832|Mouse cursor moves in the background during gameplay, disrupting gameplay
|otherissuescount=2}}
'''Other'''
*Fixed various crashes.
*Fixed texture memory leak that occurred while users were on a server with multiple users joining and disconnecting.
